channel.title: networking on Youshitsune
channel.description: Recent content in networking on Youshitsune

item.title: A New Protocol Gemini
item.description: First, we need to figure out What is protocol? What is protocol? Internet protocol is way that information gets to you. Now used protocol is HTTP/HTTPS. Which is acronym for Hypertext Transfer Protocol/Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure. What is Gemini? Gemini is a new internet protocol which: Is heavier than gopher Is lighter than the web Will not replace either Strives for maximum power to weight ratio Takes user privacy very seriously How to access Gemini network?
